test_your_xhosa_knowledge: Vavanya ulwazi lwakho lwesiXhosa noSazi kunye nosapho lwakhe ngaphambi kokuba ungene kwizifundo zethu ezimnandi nezisebenzisanayo! Khetha inqanaba lakho, phendula imibuzo embalwa, okanye uveze iimpendulo ukuze uqale ukufunda ngoku.
test_your_xhosa_knowledge_full: Vavanya ulwazi lwakho lwesiXhosa noSazi kunye nosapho lwakhe ngaphambi kokuba ungene kwizifundo zethu ezimnandi nezisebenzisanayo! Kwi-Saz’ isiXhosa, no Sapho, simema abafundi beminyaka yonke ukuba bahlolisise ubuhle bolwimi lwesiXhosa nenkcubeko. Khetha inqanaba lakho—owuqalayo, ophakathi, okanye ingcali/isithethi somthonyama—kwaye uphendule imibuzo embalwa ukuze uvavanye izakhono zakho. Ungaveza iimpendulo ukuze uqale ukufunda ngoko nangoko.
our_site_offers: Indawo yethu inikezela ngendawo efudumeleyo, ebukekayo yokufunda ngesigama, amabinzana, amanani, igrama, kunye nenkcubeko. Ukusuka kuvuyo lwe-Ukuxoxa Iintsomi (ukubalisa iintsomi) ukuya kwizakhono zolwimi ezisebenzayo, sidibanisa ilifa lemveli kunye nokufunda kwale mihla. Hlola icandelo lethu le-Isiko ukuze ufumane amabali aseTranskei okanye uzame i-Imisebenzi yethu ukuze wenze ukufunda kube mnandi. Masigcine isiXhosa siphila kunye!
